original_title: Banned from Television: Prison Files II
overview: Journey once again into the world of concrete and violence. Banned from Television: The Prison Files II brings you back inside the prison walls from raw, uncensored, never before seen footage of strip searches, attack dogs, hoses and gas grenades. Watch this tape and learn why crime doesn't pay.
tagline: You'll think twice before breaking the law!!
title: Banned from Television: Prison Files II
